definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Moreover, the skull has features resembling those of contemporary Asians.
sentences.chinese: 此外，該頭骨具備類似現代亞洲人頭骨的特徵。

sentences.english: Moreover, the skull has features resembling those of contemporary Asians.
sentences.chinese: 此外，該頭骨具備類似現代亞洲人頭骨的特徵。

sentences.english: The fossil (skull) of "Peking Man" (LPP) discovered in Zhoukoudian, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京猿人頭骨化石在周口店發現。

sentences.english: Its skull had several spine- and wart-like protrusions.
sentences.chinese: 牠的頭骨有數根尖狀物與瘤狀突起。

sentences.english: The skull is well domed , showing a pronounced occipital protuberance.
sentences.chinese: 頭骨是半球形的，枕骨凸起十分明顯。

sentences.english: Discreet skull with red crystal between jaws.
sentences.chinese: 謹慎的頭骨，口含紅寶石。

sentences.english: Swerving to miss them, he crashed, fractured his skull, and died.
sentences.chinese: 突然轉向，以懷念他們，他墜毀他的頭骨斷裂和死亡。

sentences.english: But when they went out to bury her, they found nothing except her skull, her feet and her hands.
sentences.chinese: 他們就去葬埋她，只尋得她的頭骨和腳，並手掌。

sentences.english: The fossils of "Shandingdong Man" (UPP) discovered in Zhoukoudian.
sentences.chinese: 山頂洞人頭骨化石在周口店發現。

sentences.english: Their territory is often "posted" with the skulls of trespassers.
sentences.chinese: 他們的領土經常用擅闖者的頭骨“標記”。

sentences.english: It's a two-step process: First, you use adult skulls to estimate the newborn's skull size.
sentences.chinese: 首先，通過成年頭骨來估計出新生兒頭骨尺寸。

sentences.english: It's a two-step process: First, you use adult skulls to estimate the newborn's skull size.
sentences.chinese: 首先，通過成年頭骨來估計出新生兒頭骨尺寸。

sentences.english: And still another type of pit is square shaped, for special burials of only human skulls.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還有一種是方形坑，是專門埋葬人頭骨的。

sentences.english: One location yielded Omo I, which includes part of a skull plus skeletal bones.
sentences.chinese: 出土的包括一些頭骨和軀幹骨的化石殘片。

sentences.english: The tiny skull belonged to a young Heterodontosaurus.
sentences.chinese: 這人小型頭骨屬於一隻幼年畸齒龍。

sentences.english: The skull fragment was displayed, but only photographs of Hitler's jawbone were on view.
sentences.chinese: 頭骨碎片以實物的方式展出，而顎骨則只展出了照片。

definition: to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
